name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Crunchyroll One Piece Title Card Skipper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Skip to title card and improve the One Piece experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to: 
- Skip to the title card of One Piece in Crunchyroll based on user comments 
- Increase playback speed up to 2x on all of Crunchyroll
- Decrease playback speed on all of Crunchyroll
